title: Loving Hut - Dukelskych Hrdinu
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Fast food, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individually family owned and operated. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and desserts. Has noodles, rice, faux meat dishes, tofu, pasta, soups.
